episode.title: Fix My Friend
episode.summary: The clothiers create looks to accompany new hairstyles for women who are in need of makeovers. British fashion designer Alice Temperley serves as the guest judge.

episode.title: Starving Artist
episode.summary: In a sales-based test, the clothiers are tasked to sell their goods to folks on the street. They must also spin out fall looks. Designer Anna Sui is the guest judge.

description.short: From the minds of the Bravo Network, supermodel Heidi Klum, and Elle Magazine comes Project Runway ...
description.long: From the minds of the Bravo Network, supermodel Heidi Klum, and Elle Magazine comes Project Runway (a spinoff of the Emmy-nominated series Project Greenlight), an all-new behind-the-scene documentary series and competition set in the other most glamorous business in the world: the fashion industry. Cameras will roll as up-and-coming designers compete in weekly challenges and are given all the resources of a top designer to prepare a competitive runway show for the next Fashion Week. Supermodel Heidi Klum co-developed the series and appears as one of the celebrity judges. Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz of Project Greenlight serve as executive producers.
